text: In the 2011–12 season, CA Batna is competing in the Ligue 1 for the 21st season, as well as the Algerian Cup. ==Squad list== Players and squad numbers last updated on 18 November 2011. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules.
